attributes.action: ensure the amendments to the Highway Code to stop people riding horses 2 abreast should be implemented
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many  drivers would appreciate the implementation of this amendment on road safety grounds, horse riders seem to feel that the car should always give way to them and generally will ride 2 abreast blocking the road,this attitude causes ill feeling between rider and car driver.With the present traffic conditions even on country roads novice riders and nervous horses should not be permitted as they are a risk to themselves and other road users.
